summary:
This is a simple, and possibly poor, texture edit that makes the mudcrab red.
This was inspired and created to go with the Dr Zoidberg Mudcrab sounds Mod by Snoopey.
descriptionHtml:
---Readme---

This is a simple, and possibly poor, texture edit that makes the mudcrab red.
This was inspired and created to go with the Dr Zoidberg Mudcrab sounds Mod by Snoopey.

---Installation---

Simply extract the data folder to steamapps/common/skyrim/ and overwrite anything prompted.


-Dalto11

Original textures are property of the wonderful artists at Bethesda Softworks Inc.
author: Dalto11
